Reviews.Title: I know I love it.
Reviews.Author: 2ParrotMom
Reviews.Content: I got the Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens back in September. Its my first DSLR. I have used Sony since 2005 and have been using the Sony H-5 and the Sony HX100v. I have to say it was a learning curve switching over to the Canon but a short one as I got David Busch's Canon EOS Rebel T3/1100D Guide to Digital SLR Photography book. This truly helped me a lot with the T3.My only recommendation would be to get the package with the 55-250mm tele lens that has IS ( image stabilization) on it. My 75-300mm that came with the package I ordered did not have image stabilization so much of the time I have to use my tripod for distance shots. The 18-55mm lens did come with "IS" so that was a plus, I only wish I would have really looked over what I was getting before making my decision. The cost difference is minimal. Now I am saving up to get a 55-250mm IS lens.And think about getting an AC adaptor, this comes in handy when you don't want to run your batteries down.But I will say, I adore the battery life, talk about long life. And the view finder, its outstanding on this camera. On my Sony HX100, it was awful. There are times when you need to use the VF vs the live view screen. Especially when you are in sunny condition, this VF on the Canon is tops.I think for the beginner to the world of DSLR you cant go wrong. I know of some photographers who have this T3 body and have upgraded their lens to much nicer than the kit lens. They say the T3 body is perfect. I am still learning, but from what I have been doing, I love it.  I have been shooting some close up shots of bugs, bees, lichen, moss and tiny 1/4" in diameter orange pinwheel mushrooms with the 18-55mm and getting some amazing shots. Loads of detail.I am very pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Feature-laden; offers as little or as much automation as you like...
Reviews.Author: 35-year Technology Consumer "8-tracks to 802.11"
Reviews.Content: If you need an entry-level DSLR that is feature-laden and will return you to complete control of your photography, this kit is a good choice. The two included Canon lenses will take you from focal lengths of 18 to 300 mm. The camera will capture still images (.jpg, RAW) and HD video (.mov at 1280x720 resolution).My first SLR was a completely manual Canon FTb, purchased from a friend when Jimmy Carter was president and we placed our images on film. If you were a strong amateur photographer, you might enjoy some feedback in a couple hours IF you processed your own black and white film. Otherwise, you waited, hoped for the best, and prepared for the fact of life that most of your prints would not be keepers...Fast forward to the delight of digital photography in the early 21st century, when the first cameras in the hands of consumers set you back about as much as this model..for around 2 MB resolution. While the instant gratification --and endless opportunity to experiment with images on solid state media-- of digital photography was a great change, the loss of control (from a lack of through-the-lens (TTL) viewing, no ability to set aperture and shutter speed manually and the constraint of a fixed lens) was bound to frustrate former SLR shooters.I've been doing SLR photography for over 30 years, digital photography for over 10 years. I added "D" to my SLR photography with two different Pentax cameras in the last 7 years. One had persistent issues with flash performance (even after two warranty repairs), and a more recent model simply stopped working after 17 months...only to revive when it arrived at the repair center (an event which cost $100 to find out about). So, Pentax was off my candidate list for replacements.I looked at available options than included multiple lenses and an HD video capability, and eventually narrowed it down to this kit.Pros:-Excellent price for a two lens kit and HD recording capability.-Great range of control and automation features. From full auto to completely manual, you can exercise as much (or as little) control as you like over the process.-Options for both TTL and LCD viewfinder viewing of your photo subjects.-Lightweight body-Good printed users manual and excellent .pdf manual with more detailsCons:-No memory card in the box. Hope you remembered one or have one around.-Only power option is a Canon proprietary form factor battery and AC charger. You can't charge via USB or operate via standard batteries. You'll want to consider adding an extra to your bag.-Minor issues with one of included utility programs ("Digital Photo Professional"). This can freeze (on a Windows machine) when navigating to a folder that contains images *not* produced with a Canon camera. Sounds strange...but it's true.Overall, I've been very impressed with this camera's ability to autofocus and its response to tricky lighting situations. If I can get more than 17 months out of it, it will be a better performer than the Pentax it replaced!

Reviews.Title: Solid entry-level DSLR
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Good bang for the buck kit.  As others mention, the body has a little lighter, plasticky feel, but it takes good pictures, is fairly easy to use, and gives you a good way to get your feet wet in DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Wildthing55
Reviews.Content: I've wanted an EOS for quite sometime. I have been taking pictures with it and it has been a dream come true for me. I'm not a professional by no means, but this camera has features that I am still playing with. I am very pleased with it so far. I'm impressed with the IS lenses as I have developed some tremors with medication that I take. This is a must have item!! Thanks Canon!

Reviews.Title: love the EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: richard campbell
Reviews.Content: I received this camera with a telephoto lens for Christmas.  I really enjoy the info screens that come up with each different mode.  It has made my taking pictures at horse shows easier.  My previous camera was stolen a couple of months ago and I had always struggled getting the right setting with the right lighting with indoor arenas and covered arenas with backlighting.  The camera gave me information that I used to experiment until I found the right settings to stop the action of the horses jumping over fences without all of the blurring motion.  I even switched to the video mode and shot their courses with the video.  My down side was getting the focus just right in the video mode.  I had 2 videos that came out and 1 that I stuggled with the focus.  All of the kids that I was with enjoyed the pics and video to study their performances.  Another thing that I liked about the camera is the weight.  This camera and lens is much lighter than my previous camera.  I started using the autofocus more on this camera than I had on my previous due to the quickness of the focusing.  I was able to go from each jump to the next and get the camera to focus quickly.  Someone else at our barn had received a different Canon EOS (not the T3) and she didn't know which settings to use to achieve the same photos that I was getting.  I was able to help her set up her camera so that she was able to get the same quality as I was getting.The quick screens help, especially for those of us that don't have the patience to "read the manual."  I want to take the camera and experiment with it until I get the desired results.

Reviews.Title: A very good starter DLSR package
Reviews.Author: Joanna Daneman
Reviews.Content: The Good:The T3i Rebel is a very popular camera, with good reason, It does a lot--almost everything you'd need in a DSLR, including video. There are two newer models, a T4i (which had issues with the coating and was discontinued) and the T5i, which has a touchscreen, some added features and a stereo mic for the video.The new rotating screen in the T3i and up--a very good feature. The main difference to the new T5i is that it is NOT a touchscreen. The new screen is also a lot larger and flips around. This makes video shooting a lot easier and it's much nicer to tuck it away when your camera is put in the bag.You also get the the ability to control wireless flash.The new Creative Filters are added after you take your picture and can add the effect of a toy (Lomo) camera, fisheye and grainy black and white. They are fun. I got some great effects with these.The "A" setting (automatic) now is "A+" and has "Intelligent Scene Analysis" and figures out, based on what you are photographing, color balance and other tweaks.The Video lets you do HD video shooting, including "Video Snapshot" (short clips 2, 4 or 8 second)This is a nice lens package; the 18-55mm IS is a good standard lens. The 75-300mm is a decent telephoto (I got some great bird shots) but it isn't IS (internally stabilized) and it isn't USM either.The Bad:The included 75-300mm lens is not very fast and you will need a tripod to use it most of the time--no IS (internal stabilization.) I find it is not as sharp, even on a tripod as the shorter 55-250mm lens. Doing night photography, I could see some chromatic aberration at 300mm.Bottom line: at the four-hundred something price point for 2 lenses and body, a real deal and heartily recommended for a first DSLR.

Reviews.Title: You CAN love a digital as much as your beloved 35-mm!!!
Reviews.Author: M. E. Pendle "Chantia999"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera.  I did some semi-professional photography years back with a Canon AE-1 (35-mm) and it was an awesome camera.  I have avoided digital photography for years simply because I was so afraid I would be very disappointed.  The last batch of 35-mm films I had developed were, tragically, pitiful. The colors were all wrong. When I finally saw the Rebel T3 I felt like maybe it might be the camera that brought me successfully into the world of digital photography -- and it did with flying colors.  No more trips in the middle of the night to have film quickly processed.  Life has been good!  I am finding a lots of settings the camera can do that I have no idea what they will end up shooting .... but all is well in the end and the happy suprises of having photographs that I didn't realize I could do.  It is great and I would fully recommend it to anyone who wants a full usage camera where you, yourself, are the "star".  I am 66 years old.  It takes a bit to impress me.  This little camera certainly did and them some.  I am a very happy photo shooter once again.  Thanks, Canon, for remembering how great the old cameras were when we opened them for the first time (and every time afterwards) --- and thank you for recreating the same memorable experience with the new cameras.  I'm as excited as I was at getting my first camera at age 20 and I know this one will be even better as time goes on and I find out just what all of those buttons actually mean.!!!  Amazon, you guys rock !!!  I am one happy lady now!

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: harrismm
Reviews.Content: I love this camara and the lenes that it came with, shipping was faster the expected and everything works.  Taking that camara to Disney in 9 days,  can't wait to play with is all day long :D

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: loralea21
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT -- very costly to invest into specially with the larger lens but captures some awesome pictures.  I have had issues but a good friend of mine photos for a living and gives me free help!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Pictures
Reviews.Author: mcott
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter who never owned a DSLR and I gave her a 10 minute lesson about the features, she took it on a trip to her daughters cheerleading event and took great action pictures.  This is a great testament as to how easy this camera is to use.

Reviews.Title: Cannon 3ti is great
Reviews.Author: Jill Gregerson
Reviews.Content: It is a fun, entiy level DSLR; $500 for a body and two lenses! Finding it is very common. Since many have the same camera, it is easier to learn.

Reviews.Title: It do what it says at the range
Reviews.Author: Luis E. Chacon B "- Luis"
Reviews.Content: Before buying i've read a lot of comments about this camera to avoid my previous frustration with a Kodak z990.I know its a entry level DSLR camera but can be used by a Pro Too.I knew it was made of plastic so i hope a plastic camera and it was what I got.Excellent camera excellent shots, very fast autofocus compared with my previous Kodak Z990.Read well:- Its made of plastic: Come on!!! Canon have to reduce price in any way. Instead of complain about that we have to be thankfull with them because they though in us, the low budget but high in heart photographer.- Fast flash recovery.- Fast autofocus.- Fast metering.I'm very satisfied with the performance of this item. Recommended camera 100%.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: the camera i purchased doesnt work. I have charged the battery and bought a new SD card. and it still comes with an error 20. "turn off camera and re start, remove battery and restart"im not sure if it is a faulty carmera or battery, im currently over seas and can not take this in to a camera shop it see the problem.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for daughters softball and volleyball games.  I am very pleased with this camera.  It takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: my rebel
Reviews.Author: R. Robinett "R. Scott"
Reviews.Content: finally broke down this year and bought a half descent camera.  I have been using those point and shoots so long I didn't know that there was a reason to have a nice camera.  This is not top of the line, but what a difference.  Lucky for me, the first day I got it out a Coopers hawk landed about 50 yards from the house and I got the telephoto lens and got a wonderful picture.  I was sold, I had made the right decision.I had a Minolta years ago (the old film days), but never really mastered it.  I'm working on it this time and going through every setting and every feature to be come competent.  Also, taking it off Auto and putting it through its paces in every light and situation.  Without the cost of film, it really makes sense to take as many pictures as possible.Only a very few things I think could be better.  The LCD is functional, thought, is fixed and can not fold out or rotate around (not sure why I want that, but I do).  Some of the controls are not instinctive and I find myself pushing the wrong buttons over and over to view the pictures, or go through the settings.I like it, and would recommend it for entry level to anyone that would like to understand DSLRs.

Reviews.Title: Always top-shelf quality
Reviews.Author: creativemusic
Reviews.Content: For years, I was a hard core Nikon fan. Then came the auto focus age. I found that Canon's focusing response was quicker than Nikon. When I finally had to give up on film cameras, I chose Canon. This camera is fantastic for the price.It has nearly all the features of their more expensive bodies and performs extremely well. And with the addition of the 75-300 EF lens, it takes care of most of my needs without a single problem.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: darla
Reviews.Content: The seller was amazing. Fast, accurate, and the price was great. The camera was actually a gift for my mom who has, in recent years, developed unsteady hands. She has been frustrated for a couple of years that all her pictures come out terrible due to her shaky hands. She has had this camera since Thanksgiving and tells me daily how wonderful it is, how clear the pictures are. They gave a great deal for the camera and the extra lens. Well done!

Reviews.Title: My Best Puchase
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: I Love this camera!! I am so new to photography, and I am glad this will be the camera I am using! The pictures look great, but look even better when uploaded!!Just love this camera!

Reviews.Title: Good quality and easy to use but AF seems slow.
Reviews.Author: Harry Sachs "Dingle"
Reviews.Content: I basically agree with all the other positive reviews for this camera, it is fairly idiot proof. However, the auto focus is quite a bit slower than my Canon Elan 7e film SLR camera that I purchased nearly 10 years ago. This is my first digital SLR and was expecting the focus to be at least as quick as my Elan but it is quite a bit slower. Overall this is a great camera at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Matthew S. Lowrey "Matt..."
Reviews.Content: I have had some great experiences with this camera.  I've enjoyed everything about it and still learning all it's functionality.  Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: lynnbrks
Reviews.Content: The camera is great.  I wanted a camera that would capture my family's activites during day and night.  It takes great pictures no matter how the light is.  Love this camera.  This will create wonderful pictures for our family to remember.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: sadie hawkins
Reviews.Content: for my first "REAL" camera this camera is aweseome!!  i found it very easy to work and set up.  when you turn the dial the camera tells you what the setting is, so you don't have to guess what "type" of shot you are taking.i don't regret this purchase at all.

Reviews.Title: I love my new camera
Reviews.Author: r3vi3ws4u
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.  It is an affordable way to enter the DSLR category and I think it takes great pictures.  I am a horrible photographer so my opinions mean nothing.  I am however trying to learn as much as possible and have spent many hours playing around with all the different settings.  The software that comes with the camera is pretty powerful and I have been having a lot of fun with it.  The zoom lens that comes with it is pretty nice but I wish it was an Image Stabilizer lens.  Still a great deal from Amazon.  I will be taking this camera to Las Vegas when I get married in August and will have the chance to do some extensive photography in the desert and hopefully the Grand Canyon (if I can work up the courage to get in a helicopter).  So for now I am just reading and reading different photography websites and hopefully will retain enough of what I learned to take some good shots.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Adam Mcneese
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera and takes very professional pictures. Not so hard to learn and fun to use. I received this with the bigger lens and got an excellent deal so I am a very happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping and GREAT price.
Reviews.Author: Ben W.
Reviews.Content: I've looked for this camera and lens at a lot of places and I didn't find it at the same price. They have fast shipping, I ordered it and it came within 2 days. They even included a lens dust blower, an 8gb memory card, and a camera bag. This is a great bundle deal.

Reviews.Title: My wife LOVES this camera
Reviews.Author: Rick Payton "mauirixxx"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife for Christmas, and she refuses to share it with anyone. She loves how easy it is to switch from automatic to manual and take awesome shots. Picture quality is outstanding, the flash is very fast, we just point and shoot and we got the shot we wanted. The HD video wasn't that impressive, but we don't care about that - we have a dedicated video camera for that. The stills are just ... Amazing. We recommend this combo package to everyone, especially other parents with kids in sports.

Reviews.Title: great cam
Reviews.Author: AE44
Reviews.Content: good buy for first semi prof. dslr, great functionality, user friendly, great deal on the package.  only complaint is the LCD screen is not HD to see quality of photos very well.

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: Cathy vargas
Reviews.Content: It's great. I loved my camera the shipping was fast. And I'm really happy with it. It's fast and the pictures are clear and it's easy to make ur own adjustment to the camera

Reviews.Title: Nice entry level  camera
Reviews.Author: Kelvin
Reviews.Content: If you are looking to test the market for a SLR camera this is a good choice. Beware of some of the images on the web that says they were shot with a T3 but as you practice the shots you will learn which mode gives you the best results. I am ready for an upgrade after one year.Dislike: it was advertised with a cleaning kit and bag which never arrived.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: djmooseVA
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and very lightweight. Quality photos and easy to download afterward. Have not used the movie feature too much as I am still learning about my camera. I am a rank amateur but I love to take pictures and then edit them if necessary. Great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: i am an amatuer.
Reviews.Author: Stephanie King
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera not having any idea how to take good pictures or anything about photography really.I have had this camera for about a year and I love it. It can be a bit clunky at times, but always helps me take really clear and good pictures.Everyone always comments on my pictures saying how good they are. There are different settings and levels and I think this is a very good camera for beginner to intermediate level photographers.

Reviews.Title: Perfect to me!
Reviews.Author: Jano
Reviews.Content: Excellent! Easy to use and give you some theatrical aspect of profesional. Mu family is very happy and my facebook's friends like that.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: DCKing10
Reviews.Content: This price was great, I cannot wait to test it out on my vacation next week. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: amazing!
Reviews.Author: sharleen
Reviews.Content: This camera is really great for people starting out from beginners to intermediates. Specially with an unbeatable low price compared to most places I have searched for through other websites and stores.

Reviews.Title: Love Canon Rebel Cameras
Reviews.Author: up
Reviews.Content: The EOS Rebel T3 was a gift for my son. Having had a couple of very dependable Rebel cameras myself in the past, I thought it would a good choice for my 16 year old as well. He's fascinated with photography and has quite an eye for photographing. He absolutely loves his new camera and rarely puts it down. He's thrilled about the additional lens and is planning his near future photo journeys. It's wise to purchase a camera and lens carrying case to protect this investment. The camera comes with a guideline book and instructive DVDs. It is a very user friendly camera.

Reviews.Title: Bought it last x-mas 2012
Reviews.Author: ADL32
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife last year and she uses it all the time.  Pictures come out almost professional quality and it has good lighting and aperture features.  The 12 megapixels allow for good quality when blowing up to larger photo; and you put a zoom or telephoto lens on it and can shoot distance even at night!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Value
Reviews.Author: Jackie "Jackie"
Reviews.Content: When I bought a Canon Rebel 35 mm 15 years ago, I paid a little more than I did for this package and that was not including a zzoom lense back then.I dabble in photography with a desire to be somewhat good some day. This camera makes you want to take pictures and figure out all the tricks the camera is capable of. Having read many many reviews on this product I also took the advice of another happy owner and purchased "David Busch's Compact Filed Guide for the Can EOS Rebel T3" and am very impressed with its simplicity and ability to guide me through my camera's many capabilities.My only additional commentary at thsi time is to say that the few pictures I have taken thus far and a great reminder of why I loved my Canon Rebel 35mm - the quality is amazing......I highly recommend this product.Happy Customer!!

Reviews.Title: What a great deal!
Reviews.Author: LB
Reviews.Content: I have not found anything that I don't like about this combo. Worked perfectly right out of the box. Shipping was very fast. Having the second lens is a must if you are serious about doing photography.

Reviews.Title: A gift that keeps on giving.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Carpenter "tpcarpe"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a gift for my daughter and son-in-law.  It was a big hit.  She carried the camera on a recent trip to Scotland and brought  back hundreds of near professional-quality pictures.  She never owned a "real" camera until the Canon EOS, taking all of her photos with her smart phone.  Those days are mostly over.  The EOS is intuitive, making it easy for the novice to take fine photographs right from the start.  However, it is complex enough to allow the user to manually adjust settings to produce dramatic, artistic pictures.  The camera is a keeper!

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera GREAT Service
Reviews.Author: JennWorden "J Worden"
Reviews.Content: I don't know what else to say other than this is an awesome camera. I bought one, had to send it back because something was wrong, but sending back was super easy had money back ASAP new camera has been amazing no complains at all what so ever!  Thing happen and they were able to take care of everything FAST and EASY!

Reviews.Title: Thank you!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Henao Jaramillo
Reviews.Content: It is just what I was waiting for, both of the lenses work perfectly. Though the 75-300 don't have stabilizer. It stills a very good product. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for novice or professional
Reviews.Author: Rail Fan "Jon"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.  It takes amazingly clear pictures and has nearly endless features.  Unless you are a professional photographer and have a need or desire for a super high end camera, this will meet your every need.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: keith buckhaulter
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, works great, zoom works wonderful, clear professional pictures. I would recommend this to anyone wanting a new camera.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mertah
Reviews.Content: me& my wife like photography , it's the best camera to start to be a pro .easy to use , a lot  of photo effects & the lens it's like wow

Reviews.Title: love my canon!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This camera replaced a Nikon, Nikon jerked me around on a warranty issue so I sold it to but this! I LOVE this camera! I'm an amateur photographer bit this camera makes me look like a pro! Can't go wrong with this one!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Jain Tushar "Tushar Jain"
Reviews.Content: Before buying this camera my performance with camera was very poor. But even a pathetix photographer like me became a pro with this camera in hand. A must buy for everyone, do not worry about the bulk you have to carry. It really is worth the effort.

Reviews.Title: First reflex for my daughter
Reviews.Author: O Larghi
Reviews.Content: Cost/Benefit unbeatable.My 16 yo daughter is enjoying it very much while she takes her firsts steps on photography classes.

Reviews.Title: product not satisfactory
Reviews.Author: Irineo Pantangco Jr.
Reviews.Content: Features of camera not fulfilled with instructions given by manual and dvd. I would appreciate Canon 800 number for technical assistance.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Terry Castleberry
Reviews.Content: Great product. Does everything a photographer could want. Body weight is also very light. I would buy it again and reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Nero
Reviews.Content: My first DSLR camera. Great for the price. There are a lot of settings too but I'm not too much into the technical parts of it yet. There are a lot of quick settings for people who aren't professional photographers. I'd definitely say that this is a beginner's DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Still new to me
Reviews.Author: Southern_Belle
Reviews.Content: I've only had the Canon for a short time and I am very pleased with the ease of using it, great pictures. I also purchased the 75-300 mm lens and like how easy it is to change the lens while getting just the right shot.

Reviews.Title: Sister's Purchase
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: My sister bought this camera after doing a lot of research. She loves it and uses it to take pictures all of the time.

Reviews.Title: Husband loves his birthday gift!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Sufficient for his use photographing birds and scenery.  He has been very satisfied with the resolution and output from this camera package.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHOTOS !
Reviews.Author: Barb Roberts
Reviews.Content: Very easy to learn the basics and be able to function with the lenses.  Took fantastic pictures on safari and I was a novice.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Gayla
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera, awesome quick delivery. Great bundled package at a great price. Wish I could have bought several to give as gifts!

Reviews.Title: Love my Cannon Rebel
Reviews.Author: Geri
Reviews.Content: I have always used Cannon Cameras so I knew first hand that this would be a great choice for me. It is very user friendly and takes amazing photos. I highly recommend this camera. You will not be disappointed. I traveled a lot this year and came back with the best photos!! Don't hesitate buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my first upgrade from a point-and-shoot or cell phone camera, and boy, what a difference!  I didn't realize how much a good camera makes such a difference. Only thing I miss is it doesn't have some of the features the T3i has, such as TTL flash capability for off-camera flash.  But, at $100 more, I'm not sure that extra functionality is worth it.  Overall, a great camera and I am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Margaret J. Olsem
Reviews.Content: Was nervous about upping to a better quality camera after years of "aim and shoot" simplicity; but thoroughly enjoying the ease of use and great quality photos we're getting here; along with the option to switch up settings if I want to experiment with my own settings/light.

Reviews.Title: Great piece of hardware
Reviews.Author: Richard L Diaz
Reviews.Content: Canon just gets it when it comes to a camera interface. Their massive selection of lenses is great. The only camera that can even come close are the Nikons.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Javi
Reviews.Content: Looked at stores to make sure I made the right purchase and I did.  Looking forward to using it soon

Reviews.Title: It is a great camera for who is learning
Reviews.Author: jose A R F N Souza
Reviews.Content: I love my camera, but as this model is not really new, there are many models better than it. If you are learning, this camera is really good for the price you are paying, I took many nice pictures with it.

Reviews.Title: Cannon camera
Reviews.Author: Karyn
Reviews.Content: Fantastic  customer services was fantastic. I has problems with shipping and they were quick to help me search for it. The camera was delivered within a week and had to go through customs.  I received my camera within a very fast time. I would order from them again and recommend this company to my friends. Thanks for the personal one on one service!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Charles Dawson II "Charlie"
Reviews.Content: I love this product. I am new at using it. I have been buying new lenses and can't wait to take more pictures. Product came in time.

Reviews.Title: I love it....
Reviews.Author: Daniel Narag
Reviews.Content: I love this thing the time of delivery and now i used it with my family...... this is the first time i have my own DSLR camera

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: jose ignacio roman
Reviews.Content: At the begging I thought it was a cheap and disposable camera, it has no rubber grip and it's so light.But after using it for some exterior rounds of pictures I had to bit my tongue and swallow my word, just a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: 66Corvette
Reviews.Content: I got for Christmas a few years ago and loved it, my daughter wanted a good camera for taking pictures of her girls playing fast pitch ball, she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Cannon
Reviews.Author: Lisa.James
Reviews.Content: My faithful and awesome Pentax finally went out and to replace it cost way to much.In looking to purchase another camera this one was recommended to me.I love this camera. It is great and takes great pictures..BUT in no way compares to the Pentax camera I owned prior.I still rate this camera a 4 star easily!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Pictures
Reviews.Author: Emily R Conrad
Reviews.Content: I'm a novice photographer, and this camera can do an awful lot that I still haven't mastered, but I still easily get beautiful pictures. I love the option to control more or less of the features so that when I want a quick picture that I know will turn out, I can use the pre-set options or, if I want to play around with shutter speed or exposure, I can do that, too. Either way, the detail it captures is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Clarence
Reviews.Content: loved it cant think of any thing negative to say about it. Its easy to use and photos taken with it look great

Reviews.Title: Very Good Stuff and Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: King
Reviews.Content: The sale adviser Kate answered my questions patiently. He gave me several very useful suggestions. I trust him. Now I am having fun in using my camera. Thanks  a lot, Kate.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: MiÇhell
Reviews.Content: this was an excellent purchase for a great price. looked at the same product in the store for a much more expensive price

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Eric Creitz
Reviews.Content: Been taking pictures for over 40 years, and this is probably the best camera I have used, only complaint is with the video format, need Quicktime to play it and my video editing program wont recognize it(but it can be converted).  I mainly use the full auto mode which seem to work very well for most every situation, but I have played with other modes also. I live right above the water and take lots of sunset pics and sometimes it seems to have a bit of difficulty focusing when zoomed in, but that is probably because of the brightness.  The $600.00 price for this with two lenses was a good deal, and other people I have talked to withe same camera all very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: It is extremely well made camera and easy to use.  It came with 2 different lenses.  The photo quality is awesome.  The only problem that I had was it was kind of heavy.  I have rheumatoid arthritis so I have trouble with weight of any kind.  I solved the problem by using a tripod or my elbow.  Canon can not be faulted for this.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Tams
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and he absolutely loves everything about it. Highly recommend for beginner or intermediate photographers.

Reviews.Title: First DSLR
Reviews.Author: Panshovel
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera and it is a great choice. It is very easy to use right out of the box. The advanced settings will allow me to learn how to take even better pictures later. The zoom lens in this package is great to shots of our Alaska wildlife. And the included software is everything a beginner needs to edit and share great pictures. I love. This camera.

Reviews.Title: Finally Got to Use
Reviews.Author: M. Galloway "M Galloway"
Reviews.Content: I bought this item as a Christmas present for me.  There still a lot of things that I have to learn to do with the camera.  I used it for the first time yesterday.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: This is an awsome Camera.
Reviews.Author: Cardie
Reviews.Content: I had no experience with cameras other the the point and shoot kind so I did a lot of research, read a lot of reviews for all kinds of cameras, Nikon, Sony . . .and more before settling on the Canon Rebel T3.  I have no regrets, none.  The pictures we've taken are beautiful and there are so many features I don't know how to use yet and I've had the camera a year now.  I can still point and shoot with the auto focus feature but made the purchased to take "in motion" shots, as my daughter is in marching band.  I bought another lense to get out there with and I get great close ups from the stands.  Taken a lot of "macro" pictures and the detail up close is amazing.  They look professional.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Purchase--I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia Foster "Patricia A. Foster"
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, because it's easy to use, and it takes great pictures. The big zoom lens is great for landscape shots.  I took some great pictures at the  Whitchita Mountain Nature Reserve near Lawton, Oklahoma.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great, came on time and as advertised!
Reviews.Author: DougTheDrummer "DougTheDrummer"
Reviews.Content: This camera has been great. We are using it to take pictures of our new baby girl. The camera came on time and was just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: Ivan Badilla Matamoros "zurdo morado"
Reviews.Content: This product is great quality photos, the only problem is that you become vicious photographic activity will see how far we

Reviews.Title: Great camera, super recommended
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: A friend has had this camera for several months now, and it takes awesome pictures. She loves it due to the compatibility with other accessories.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price
Reviews.Author: J. L. Brundage
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the camera, the extra lens, and very happy with the price I paid, as most sell for what I paid without the extra lens.  Shipping was fast and everything arrived in great condition

Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: L. Culp
Reviews.Content: I got this for my girlfriend for a christmas gift although I havn't played with it she absolutely loves it and the pictures we get are far better than any other camera I have seem.

Reviews.Title: Great Easy and Amazing
Reviews.Author: John Russo
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing.  Picture quality is excellent and easy to use. Software use is user friendly and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: tmckee0933
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my canon EOS Rebel......I've used the 3 and up and can't really see a differance other than the shutter speed is a wee bit faster but I have to say, I've never taken such great pictures and it came in no time

Reviews.Title: Wife Love it
Reviews.Author: Ronnie B. Littler
Reviews.Content: Christmas present for my wife and loves the quality of the pics and ease of use. Will get a real test though when the spring comes.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Slack
Reviews.Content: Gave to Significant other for xmas gift. Works well and Arrived in Great condition and was well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Twins Franchise "Twins Franchise"
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera.  It takes beautiful pictures.  I can't put much of a review as to the features it offers since I am still learning.  I plan to take a class on how to use it in different settings.  I will update my posting once I do this.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3 camera
Reviews.Author: shopper
Reviews.Content: This was my first SLR digital.  It is easy to use and FUN.  I will have years of enjoyment using this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Customer Bob
Reviews.Content: We bought this package as an upgrade from our little point-and-shoot digital camera (also a Canon), and couldn't be happier with the results.  The only disappointment is the extra zoom lens that came with it--the decline in picture quality is too noticeable for my liking when using that lens--but since we rarely (if ever) need a zoom that long, we stick with the 18-55mm lens and it does just about everything we need it to do.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: E
Reviews.Content: awesome camera, need to really get the 28-135mm IS lens though. also just watch the pricing seems to change with other sellers, could get a better deal.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens...
Reviews.Author: Sergiy
Reviews.Content: Have had this camera for almost a year, I can say that it takes great pictures, light, good fit for large hands, outstanding battery life, well worth the money spent, you will not be disapointed with purchasing, great fun to use and has had not a single issue in it's operation, what else could you ask for!

Reviews.Title: Good Cam
Reviews.Author: Ramon
Reviews.Content: Really like. the cam is very easy to handle and have also manual modes to learn how to take pictures

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: marwa
Reviews.Content: I just love it! but make sure to purchase a bag for it in order to keep it safethe 75-300 mm lens is really nice for face portraits, but you have to go very far from the face in order to get it all in frame :)

Reviews.Title: camera batterys
Reviews.Author: lowell
Reviews.Content: they  keep good a charge just like my cannon battery im looking forward to shopping for more camera stuff. lowell

Reviews.Title: Great Lens
Reviews.Author: MATT
Reviews.Content: This is a great long-range zoom.  I recommend always buying OEM lenses like this.  Canon is great, especially the T3 improvements.

Reviews.Title: Does more than I understand
Reviews.Author: Frank K. Smith "One FIne Announcer"
Reviews.Content: This camera is meant for people like me. It's a great point-and-shoot machine. I try to use some of the other goodies (there are many), but after I used them once, a week later I have to go back and re-read the instructions. But wowie! does it do nice work. Combine your shots with a little Photoshop knowledge and you can impress a lot of people with your artistic abilities.There are newer versions of this camera ad I have no doubt they are even more impressive.BE SURE to buy the case that goes with the camera. You will get real tired of lugging a camera "goodie bag" around.

Reviews.Title: My toy
Reviews.Author: S. Bowen
Reviews.Content: Great deal on the package with two different lenses. Takes wonderful pictures. I need to get some accessories for it to personalize it for my usage needs.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!
Reviews.Author: Sienna
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  Great for a beginner like myself.  Would recommend for anyone wanting a "user friendly" Digital SLR! :)

Reviews.Title: Got what I expected and even better
Reviews.Author: Sharoon Qaiser
Reviews.Content: Buying a used DSLR is always slippery road , This is my first used DSLR and couldnt be more happy , It was hardly used and shutter count was well under 400 ... A sigh of relief .... looked and smelled brand new with all original stuff . This camera comes with Kit Lens and A telescopic lens and if you buy the telescopic lens separately , will cost you 200$ , so actually with 30$ kit bag and 200$ lens , the price I paid for camera body was just 200$ ... so no deal can be sweater than that . Now camera itself .. Everyone will say its a good beginner DSLR , I agree to disagree - Its more than beginner entry level DSLR , I have a full frame camera and I have no difficulties in getting almost same results , I said almost because off course there is a difference but its like comparing apple to apple not oranges . So if you are low on budget cant spare more than 500-600$ then this is best thing money can buy . Out from the box its easy to use , click your way into photography ... Cheers .

Reviews.Title: It's early but we love this camera
Reviews.Author: Landon Reed
Reviews.Content: We've had it a week and have already taken many high quality photos with this camera and the long lens. Most impressive to us is how well this camera shoots picture WITHOUT the flash. We hardly turn this feature on. We noticed immediately that non flash shots in low light come out great...very warm and natural looking. The flash shots in the same light were clear but made faces look more pasty and unflattering. We took this out for some action sledding shot and using the view finder , not the digital screen, we took dozens of excellent shots. Also noticed by us is that it's better to use the manual feature for almost all shots, which with this camera is very easy to do. The auto took to long to make a decision often and we issued shots or they were blurry too often.We are no photo experts as some here seems to be but wow do we love what were getting out of the revel camera.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Diane Stevenson
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my sister and she was thrilled.  It made her very, very happy Christmas morning.

Reviews.Title: Very happy!
Reviews.Author: San  Martin
Reviews.Content: Thank, all in time. good job to your team and happy new year to your team. I'll be looking forward to buy more stuff from you guys.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kenyata Carter "k.carter"
Reviews.Content: I have had my camera about a year now. It was received before the day it was scheduled. I love it and love photographing with it. People see me with it and think im the best photographer out there!!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: My daughter is an excellent photographer and really likes the simplicity and quality of this camera. The telephoto lens is top notch- but anything above 200mm requires a tripod (which we also bought..)

Reviews.Title: Our son loves the Canon Rebel
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Lynn
Reviews.Content: We gave our son the Canon EOS Rebel as a Christmas gift.  He absolutely loves the camera and the lens.  It is easy to use and makes the casual photograher's pictures look like they were taken by a pro.

Reviews.Title: I'm really happy with this product.
Reviews.Author: ana cuevas
Reviews.Content: This bundle really exceeded my expectations. It includes more than what is said in the ad. The camera works really well and we can take awesome pictures.

Reviews.Title: Review for Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens.
Reviews.Author: Ranji Vaidyanathan
Reviews.Content: The camera is pretty good, but the lens is not the fastest for the price paid. I wish you could have offered an f stop less than 2 for slightly higher price. Maybe the offered item is good for a beginner but for someone who is a little experienced, this is not good enough.

Reviews.Title: So glad I bought this
Reviews.Author: Try and Tell
Reviews.Content: I got this for a fantastic deal (Black Friday) to replace my Rebel XLT which I enjoyed but struggled with lighting situations.  I don't have an exterior flash yet and dislike using the on board flash.  The Rebel T3 handles low light/inside lighting situations far superior to my previous camera.  I also bought the camera because it included a 75 -300mm zoom lens which I've wanted for awhile. It doesn't have the IS capabilities like the 18-55 but I've been able (with monopod) to get some great school program pics from a great distance with no flash (and therefore little interruption to those around me.) I am not a professional photographer but this has already allowed me to get some wonderful pics that would not have been available to me before.  I'm looking forward to trying out the advanced capabilities of the camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Tammy McPherson
Reviews.Content: This camera is so easy to use! It takes awesome pictures with beautiful colors and the lenses are easy to change.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Jesse R
Reviews.Content: Image Quality is great check out the link to see for yourself. Ive had it for 2 weeks now upgraded from point and shoot to this and it was worth the money the second lens does come in handy.[...]

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera and lens
Reviews.Author: James Mathieson
Reviews.Content: Easy to use with excellent results.  High quality camera and , with resulting high quality photos.  All necessary material is included, with excellent DVD's and websites

Reviews.Title: Switched to Canon
Reviews.Author: Peter D. Schaller
Reviews.Content: I just switched over to Canon, and bougt the Rebel T3, which was a great decision. I am enjoying experimenting with the different functions on the camera and have been quite satisfied with the quality and efficiency of the camera. For the price, I think this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Sharanya
Reviews.Content: It takes some time getting used to and adjusting the settings to your likings. This is my first DSLR so I needed to learn the hard way on how to use this camera. But it takes quality pictures once you get the hang of it.

Reviews.Title: best camera I have ever bought
Reviews.Author: Bernadette Belcher
Reviews.Content: The picture performance is out of this world. The specific ajustments the camera offers gives you professional pictures at a fraction of what a photographer would charge

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: William F. Nicholson III
Reviews.Content: Great Camera..came quickly and the phtos are fantastic..the zoom lense is very good as is the standard. Easy to use and very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Got some great pictures already. I will need to read the manual to be able to use all its functions though. Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for school yearbook pictures!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Smith
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use- just took it out of the box and started using it.  Even our students find it easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Camera
Reviews.Author: Photographer in Training
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the T3!! It is a great starter camera! I am learning more about the camera everyday, it takes awesome pictures and the quality is great ( for beginners) lol, the few pictures that I have taken have gotten a lot of positive feedback! And the extra lense that comes with it is always a plus :) Definitely a good buy!

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Terence Gilbert
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful camera......I already own an XSi and bought this camera and lens for my daughter......excellrnt product and so easy to produce super quality pictures. Easy to use....

Reviews.Title: A Great Product At A Great Price
Reviews.Author: TruthAlwaysWins
Reviews.Content: The Canon EOS Rebel T3 is absolutely fantastic in its scope and yet quite easy to use to get excellent automatic photographs. The numerous tweaks and options allow for fine art photography after learning the finer points of this camera. In addition, it is light weight, even with the Canon EF 75~300 mm Telephoto Zoom Lens attached. The product arrived in 2 days and the price couldn't be beat. I'd recommend the camera and the source to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about a month ago.  This is my first SLR and I love it.  My biggest issue with my point and shoot digital is that it was too slow.  The continuous shooting feature solves this problem.  I have been able to take some pretty amazing pictures with this and find it hard to believe I will outgrow this camera anytime soon.  It's super easy to use and I love "playing" with all the features and learning what settings create the best pictures.  Although I rarely use the extra lens, I'm definitely glad I have it for the future.  This lens is going to be great for shooting my son participating in sports and such.  I would recommend this Cannon to any person who has never had a SLR camera and wants to graduate to something a bit more serious than a Powershot type of camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: nharward
Reviews.Content: Good vlaue easy to use. Crisp pictures. I also purchased the camera bag and it fits nicely inside.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: kits not too appealing. i bought this camera/extra lens package, a b+w 58mm multi-coated lens cap, a lowepro rezo 160 aw camera bag, and a sandisk 32g extreme sdhc card.  can't beleive it all works together so well. usually i'm not that lucky. thanks amazon for having a marketplace that contains all this cool and quality stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great for art photo. My first DSLR & so far very impressive
Reviews.Author: Nataliya
Reviews.Content: I got it to take pictures of my oil art projects, which did not come out good on a regular digital camerait arrived super fast, it is quite easy for beginner to figure out, at the right setting  you can see the finest detail and the colors  match which is hard to capture on an oil painting when photographing it. I took few random pictures and I think I will use this camera for more than my paintings.In addition to fast shipping, it has come with few gifts I did not expect, It included a Zeikos ZE-CA48B Deluxe Soft Medium Camera and Video Bag, Zeikos ZE-BLR Deluxe Dust Blower (Black) which smells a bit of rubber, but cant complain about free stuff, and Dane-Elec 8 GB Class 4 SDHC Flash Memory Card DA-SD-8192-R which i expected from canon, they always give you one.One note: It did come with theCanon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens I am not sure if you get these with the cheaper version of the camera.I wil augment this post if anything goes wrong

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera, Great value
Reviews.Author: Daniel McGee
Reviews.Content: Canon always makes a great product and this camera is no exception. It is a great value with both lenses. Great photos.

Reviews.Title: what I have always wanted
Reviews.Author: WiccaMagick
Reviews.Content: I have always wanted an EOS camera and this one was a terrific buy for what came with it. I am still trying to get the hang of operating it in modes other than automatic, but have already gotten some amazing pictures. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a more advanced camera than point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Grant Peterson
Reviews.Content: for the price and it included the extra lens.  It takes excellent photos and I have been very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: the product works but it doesn't have enough features...spend a little more and get the features that you will need later on
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: Go for the upgraded model with the remote and screen view...spend a little more and get the features that you will need later on ....

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: cncmama
Reviews.Content: I'm not a camera expert, but I highly recommend this product.  It came with everything listed and I have really enjoyed using it.  My main use is for sports and I will know more come football season.  So far, this gets an A+ from me.

Reviews.Title: WHAT WAS I WAITING FOR
Reviews.Author: Dee S. "Dee S."
Reviews.Content: OMG I LOVE THIS CAMERA and extra lense. I don't know why I waited so long to get this. I wanted a nice camera like this forever and now I regret waiting. I have taken a ton of beautiful pictures with it and it has been worth ever penny I paid.I have not had any problems hooking it up to my Apple or my PC but then I have never had problems with Canon ever.

Reviews.Title: El equipo fotografico cumplió mis requerimientos, el conjunto de cámaras mas los 2 lentes es muy recomendable
Reviews.Author: Eugenio
Reviews.Content: E quipo CANON tiene toda la experiencia en buenas máquinas fotograficas.  Mi promera cámara fotografica fue una CANON hace 30 años atras, que me fue fiel por mucho tiempo hasta que la tecnología digital la reemplazo

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Fatema Taqi "creat life taqi"
Reviews.Content: very good qualitygood and perfect pricevery protective case which perfect good to be shipped with out worrying about brokevery nice

Reviews.Title: So far, so good.
Reviews.Author: Mary-Alice Mercier
Reviews.Content: It is spectacular, it is taking great photos. I have hardly put it down since it came in the mail! I have already done one photoshoot with it! It is my next step and transition to bigger cameras and I am super excited to keep using it daily. It is magnificent and spectacular. And I would recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - Bonus Lens
Reviews.Author: M. Matthews "Moody"
Reviews.Content: Replaced an older model.  Great camera with a good price.  Getting the extra lens did help the overall cost.  Good buy

Reviews.Title: Excited about the purchase....
Reviews.Author: Product Purchaser
Reviews.Content: Need to learn how to use all features, but my first few times just playing around with my camera &I; lenses have been great!  Love how clear the pictures look!

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA EVER
Reviews.Author: MARIE GRIER
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS SO NICE. THE RECORDING FEATURE IS A BONUS AND WHAT A GREAT PRICE. THE 2 LENSES MADE IT AN EVEN BETTER DEAL.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Jessica S. Emler
Reviews.Content: I live this product. Came just in time for me to get some fabulous vacation puctures. I am hoping to get some accessories soon.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures with very little effort
Reviews.Author: Kim the book lover
Reviews.Content: Takes beautfiul pictures with very little effort. Cannot wait to really learn how to use this camera and learn more about digital photography.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. Lemley "denlem"
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera before taking a trip to Charleston, SC.  Took great pictures and was very easy to operate.  Went to Overstock.com and the same camera was over $100.00 more. Would highly recommend this camera to beginners.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again
Reviews.Author: TA
Reviews.Content: Wonderfully easy to use and the quality is fantastic. Have used Canon systems in the past, so I stayed with a brand I trusted, and I have not been disappointed. I look forward to adding other lenses to this system and recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Nice for a regular use dslr
Reviews.Author: Karlz Designz
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, plenty of settings to do almost anything. Why spend more?? I might actually get another one for a second lens.

Reviews.Title: By far the best investment i have purchased:)
Reviews.Author: tyana
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera. It is so easy to change the lens and the quality of the pictures are amazing! I am not a photographer but the pictures look so nice, i always get compliments! Just would love to have some kind of protection or warranty on it. But otherwise, would really recommend this product to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Ann Ueno
Reviews.Content: In doing my research, the Canon Rebel came highly recommended from friends.  And then I researched more on Amazon.  And I was sold.  And I have to say, the camera is amazing.  It's generally easy to use, the shots come out amazing, the functionality is superb.  I am very happy with this and would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS
Reviews.Author: moon1
Reviews.Content: Product was as advertised and arrived on time.  The Canon EOS takes great pictures and is easy to use. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great for a beginner
Reviews.Author: KOTW
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I was tired of my tiny point-and-shoot camera. Those are just too slow when I wanna take consecutive shots. Good zoom! I was able to take nice, clear close-up shots from far away. I like to randomly snap pictures here and there so any dslr pretty much suits my need, especially an inexpensive one like this. But if you desire quality, which I don't, I think you should go for other models.

Reviews.Title: great camera kit for the price
Reviews.Author: julio
Reviews.Content: I bought this a few months back on an impulse buy.  I read about it and alot of people recommended it as a good dslr for beginners.  I started out using the auto mode and it took some real good pics.  I even took it to fleet week and slapped on the big lens and took real good pictures of the blue angels.  Was pretty amazed of the clarity and close ups I got with it.  So my next step is taking some classes and learning all the the tricks of the camera.  I recommend this as a starter cam but I am surely going to move up to something else once I get the hang of everything. A few photographers already recommended I get a 50mm lens as it takes great pictures since the ones in the kit arent the best.

Reviews.Title: Muy buen producto.
Reviews.Author: Ariel Herrera
Reviews.Content: Llego en el tiempo pactado, sin piezas faltantes. Es un producto de buena calidad, tanto la carcaza de la camara como los lentes.

Reviews.Title: Did not come with 300mm lens like stated
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera said it was supposed to come with the 300mm lens, but when i received the package i got a slip that said the lens was back ordered. I want to know why this was not stated when i was purchasing the camera. The main reason i purchased it off amazon was because it said it came with the second lens. If i would have known it was back ordered i would have not purchased the camera. I am very upset and unsatisfied with my purchase. Beware if you purchase you might not receive your second lens with your package.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3 12.2
Reviews.Author: margaret klain "peggyck"
Reviews.Content: So far, I really like this camera. I have not used it very much and look forward to testing it further. It is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Quality Product? Look elsewhere!
Reviews.Author: Nathan Risto
Reviews.Content: I less than 2 months, this camera has already become completely defective. It no longer takes photos of any kind. I have to send off the camera to Canon to have it repaired. I am out the shipping costs to send it there.So I can't recommend this product to anyone. No $500 item should ever be dead in less than 60 days.

Reviews.Title: The Rebel's (extra) LOUD Clicks!
Reviews.Author: John Clayton
Reviews.Content: I'm a Sr. citizen and have had many fine cameras in my life. When I got the Canon EOS Rebel T3 took my first pix, there is a loud sort of metallic click. It sounds like a camera built years ago when such things were just invented. Is THIS loud click normal, or is my Canon EOS Rebel a misfit and should be returned or replaced? I'd really like some feedback on this.

ProductInfo.Features:
Kit includes two products All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties
Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens
Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens. Battery 1x LP-E10  Rechargeable Lithium-Ion Battery Pack
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS II Lens + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens
